answers.author: Stephanie Klinkenberger
answers.text:
Hi Andy,
The Virginia Beach Public Library does not have an agreement for current local papers to be digitized; however, we do have an agreement for historical out-of-print papers. Our Central Librarian contacted the owner of the paper to receive verbal permission to digitize, then she followed up via email and the agreement. Hope this form is of some use.


Hi Andy,

author: Andy White
text: I am looking for a sample agreement between a newspaper and a government entity (public library is a perfect match) to host the digital archives of the local paper on the entity's website.
title: Public Library hosting local paper's digital archives
